articles.title: The subjective
articles.description: From art to opinions on mundane matters!
articles.contents:
I am a PhD student at Saarland University studying the cognitive processes involved in human language comprehension.Click here for my academic work.







This blog is the place where I pour my unsettled and provisional opinions and thoughts without any constraint on the breadth of topic. It is also a space to post some artwork: poetry and generative art.

articles.title: Art
articles.contents:
